formattedAddress: 128 W 36th St. 4th Floor, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 128 W 36th St. 4th Floor, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: I am so glad I went to Jude for my wedding dress!! He is an artist, and truly a pleasure to work with. He made a completely custom dress for me that was so gorgeous and perfect for our wedding. We had probably 5 fitting sessions in his NYC studio, and he made sure it fit like a glove (especially the bodice - which was amazing and so important for a strapless gown). Jude made the whole process feel really special. I would recommend him to any bride!

text.text: I am so glad I went to Jude for my wedding dress!! He is an artist, and truly a pleasure to work with. He made a completely custom dress for me that was so gorgeous and perfect for our wedding. Jude made the whole process feel really special. I would recommend him to any bride!

originalText.text:
I can't say enough great things about working with Jude to create a custom wedding dress.  Most importantly, the dress was STUNNING!  At the wedding SO many guests told me it was the most beautiful gown they had ever seen, and several asked where I had gotten the dress.  Over a month later, people are still reaching out to gush over the dress.

Almost as important as loving the dress as much as I did was that I so loved working with Jude.  Jude felt like an old friend, and it was SO fun designing the dress with him.  I trusted him with ideas he had, and the final product was SO much more beautiful than I could have imagined.

Working with Jude was truly best experience, and I hope other brides are as lucky as I was to have this gem of a human being involved in their big day.

originalText.text: There are no words to describe how beautiful and perfect my wedding dress was to me, and how I am eternally grateful for meeting Jude! He answered my call at 6:30pm on a Friday night and gave me confidence that he’d be able to create exactly what I was looking for. From the memorable experience of working with Jude on the design, to seeing the final product – made of the highest quality of materials and craftsmanship – to toasting with champagne with Jude while getting to pick up my dress at L’Fay – I couldn’t have asked for a better experience. I tried on nearly 50 dresses prior to meeting Jude – I live in NYC so figured why not?! – but the one that Jude created for me was the most perfect and best quality of them all. As a further testament to his work, one of my bridesmaids is now using Jude to design her custom wedding dress as well, and I couldn’t be more thrilled for her and for Jude. Thank you for everything Jude! xxoo

originalText.text: Working with Jude for my wedding gown was the best wedding decision I made (and you make a lot of decisions / choices for your wedding)! Jude’s designs are not only custom and STUNNING they are made with love. Jude truly cares about his brides and you feel that through the design process, appointments and follow ups, even after your dress is completed. After visiting multiple bridal houses in NYC I couldn’t be happier I went with Jude Jowilson.

originalText.text: I had an incredible experience with Jude and his team when he designed my bespoke dress. Jude's attention to detail and devotion to ensuring perfection were unparalleled. Jude recommended extra fittings and wanted to ensure that everything was just right - he truly went out of his way to ensure that I had an incredible experience. I can't recommend Jude enough - he's a phenomenal designer, and now he's a lifelong friend.
